attributes.action: Stop developers building a Rail Freight Exchange in St Albans, Hertfordshire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The proposal is for the development of an international rail freight exchange.  This development is to comprise 5 huge warehouses, the largest of which is over 1 million square feet, and each will be served by a railway siding such that goods can be moved from railway freight wagons into storage in the warehouses, and ultimatately onto HGV's.  The site is the last large piece of Green Belt Land between St Albans and London.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop developers building a Rail Freight Exchange in St Albans, Hertfordshire."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17529


Prime Minister's Office
